* Iron Raptor picked herself up from the ground after, somehow, surviving 
the shuttle explosions.
A piece of it had struck her before she had had the chance to drop and a 
gash from her stomach to her left shoulder was claerly visable through her 
armor that had been torn.
Red fluid seeped from the open wound, making her grit her teeth everytime 
her waist twisted.
Her sword in hand she coughed slightly, the ash in the air not making it any 
better to see...or breath.
Her helm was knocked from her head from that piece that got her and her hair 
whipped in the wind.
So much had happened at once that she was in a slight daze.
Last thing she knew she was taking to Suncrusher and then hitting the dirt 
before a shuttle crashed. Now there was a whole battle around her.
< You pay too much attention to one thing.> She thought to herself as she 
took a slightly stumbled step forward, feeling the gash only rip up more 
along her seering through her mind.  It caused her to lean heavily on the 
sword, eventually dropping to her knees.*

" Have to...get up!"

< If some enemy catches me like this they won't think a second to turn me 
into scrap.>
